name: DiaMaze (GB)
description:
A platforming game for the original Gameboy.

Features:

  • Large map in the style of a metroidvania, full of platforming challenges
  • Automatic saving at frequent checkpoints around the world
  • NewGame+ mode (= start with equipment)

Feel free to leave a comment and share.
Good luck & have fun!

November 16th 2018

Controls:
DPad: movement
A: Action
B: Jump
Select: Minimap/Pause
